Object.Name: LwM2M Server
Object.Description1: Description: This IPSO object should be used with a temperature sensor to report a temperature measurement. It also provides resources for minimum/maximum measured values and the minimum/maximum range that can be measured by the temperature sensor. An example measurement unit is degrees Celsius (ucum:Cel).

Item.Name: Short Server ID
Item.Description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

Item.Name: Lifetime
Item.Description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

Item.Name: Default Minimum Period
Item.Description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

Item.Name: Default Maximum Period
Item.Description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

Item.Name: Disable
Item.Description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

Item.Name: Disable Timeout
Item.Description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celsius.

Item.Name: Notification Storing When Disabled or Offline
Item.Description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

Item.Name: Binding
Item.Description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

Item.Name: Registration Update Trigger
Item.Description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

Item.Name: Bootstrap-Request Trigger
Item.Description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value
